name: Bloody Paradise
keywords: grains of paradise, tomato juice, vodka, raw
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon coarsely ground grains of paradise, more for garnish
2 basil leaves, fried in oil and sprinkled with salt, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, mix together salt, grains of paradise, tomato juice, lime juice, vinegar and vodka. Shake well. Pour over a glass of ice, and grind more grains of paradise over the glass. Garnish with basil leaves.
